actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to provide for paper money of the United States to carry a designation in braille indicating the denomination.

summary.text: Provides for paper money of the United States printed after January 1, 1975, to carry a designation in braille indicating the denomination.

titles.title: A bill to provide for paper money of the United States to carry a designation in braille indicating the denomination.
